Package io.atomix.protocols.raft

Provides classes and interfaces for managing Raft clients and servers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RaftClient
    Provides an interface for submitting operations to the Raft cluster.
    RaftMetadataClient
    Raft metadata.
    RaftServer
    Provides a standalone implementation of the Raft consensus algorithm.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MultiRaftProtocol
    Multi-Raft protocol.
    MultiRaftProtocol.Type
    Multi-Raft protocol type.
    MultiRaftProtocolBuilder
    Multi-Raft protocol builder.
    MultiRaftProtocolConfig
    Raft protocol configuration.
    RaftClient.Builder
    Builds a new Raft client.
    RaftError
    Base type for Raft protocol errors.
    RaftServer.Builder
    Builds a single-use Raft server.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RaftError.Type
    Raft error types.
    RaftServer.Role
    Raft server state types.
    ReadConsistency
    Constants for specifying Raft query consistency levels.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RaftException
    Base Raft protocol exception.
    RaftException.ApplicationException  
    RaftException.ClosedSession  
    RaftException.CommandFailure  
    RaftException.ConfigurationException  
    RaftException.IllegalMemberState  
    RaftException.NoLeader  
    RaftException.OperationFailure  
    RaftException.ProtocolException  
    RaftException.QueryFailure  
    RaftException.Unavailable  
    RaftException.UnknownClient  
    RaftException.UnknownService  
    RaftException.UnknownSession  

Package io.atomix.protocols.raft Description

Provides classes and interfaces for managing Raft clients and servers.
